job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: WhatnotltbrgtltbrgtWhatnot YC W20 is a livestream shopping platform and marketplace backed by Andreessen Horowitz and Y Combinator Were one of YCs top companies and one of the fastest growing marketplaces ever Were laser focused on creating an exceptional software company team and place to work You can read our principles hereltbrgtltbrgtOur mission enable anyone to turn their passion into a business and bring people together through commerce Were building the future of ecommerce an interactive community where creators can make a living off their passionltbrgtltbrgtDid we mention were high growth Weve 10xd the company in 6 months In January Whatnot was 10 people Today our team is approaching 60 and will exceed 100 by year end Were hiring forward thinking problem solvers across all functional areas We recruit thoughtfully can move fast and are scaling fully remotelyltbrgtltbrgt Opportunity SizeltbrgtltbrgtThe ecommerce experience has been static for 20 years and is perhaps the largest opportunity in the startup space today Livestream shopping is a 170B GMV market in China and has grown 100 YoY Retail is a 5T market opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt About The Data Team ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are looking for intellectually curious highly motivated individuals to be foundational members of our Data Science and Machine Learning team You will partner across the company to identify critical goals for the business develop a deep understanding of them and design scalable solutions The ideal candidate will be able to navigate the data stack and support initiatives from data engineering product analytics exploratory data analysis to machine learning service deployments and monitoringltbrgtltbrgt RoleltbrgtltulgtltligtPartner closely across the business to find improvements and influence decisions using data science methodologies and toolsltligtltligtEnrich product gotomarket and operations with new kinds of advanced analytics and machine learning powered experiencesltligtltligtDesign and implement endtoend data pipelines and data systems that support MLOps and business processesltligtltligtCreate high quality communication devices such as dashboards notebooks documents presentations to convey insights across a broad audienceltligtltligtDefine and advance best practices within an experiment driven cultureltligtltulgt YoultbrgtltulgtltligtAs our next data scientist you should have 3 years of relevant experience plusltligtltligtExcellent verbal communications including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and nontechnical collaboratorsltligtltligtDemonstrated history of knowledge in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics Software Engineering or related technical fieldltligtltligtIndustry experience with proven ability to apply scientific methods to solve realworld problems on large scale dataltligtltligtAbility to lead initiatives across multiple product areas and communicate findings with leadership and product teamsltligtltligtExperience with operational databases such as PostgreSQL DynamoDBltligtltligtProficiency with data warehouses and big data technologies such as Snowflake Big Query SparkltligtltligtExtensive experience with Python for software development and data scienceltligtltligtAptitude and experience in applied statistics and machine learning techniquesltligtltligtFirm grasp of visualization tools interactive and selfserving such as BI dashboards and jupyter style notebooksltligtltligtFamiliarity with cloud computing platforms such as AWS or GCPltligtltligtExperience launching productionquality machine learning models eg dataset construction preprocessing deployment monitoring quality assuranceltligtltulgt BenefitsltbrgtltulgtltligtCompetitive base salary and stock options benchmarked to 90th percentileltligtltligtUnlimited Vacation Policy and No Meeting HolidaysltligtltligtAmazing Health Insurance options including a no premium plan Dental and Vision Plans with less 1 monthly employee contribution and no cost Life Insuranceltligtltligt13 Week Parental Leaveltligtltligt200 to spend within Whatnot Appltligtltligt3500 expense to buy your computer and at home work stationltligtltligt100 weekly expense for Lunchltligtltligt75 monthly expense for Internetltligtltligt75 monthly expense for Cell Phone planltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgtCurious about who thrives at Whatnot Weve found that low ego a growth mindset and leaning into action and high impact goes a long way hereltbrgtltbrgtAt Whatnot we value diversity We are an equal opportunity employer we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status We recognize that diverse teams make the strongest teams and we encourage people from all backgrounds to apply
